testcase.name: Login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Orange HRM application "https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/web/index.php/auth/login".passed When user enters username as "Admin" and password as "admin123".............passed Then user should be able to login successfully and Home page is open........passed

testcase.name: Login with Invalid credentials - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Orange HRM application "https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/web/index.php/auth/login".passed When user enters username as "Admin123" and password as "admin123$".........passed Then user should be able to see the error Message "Invalid credentials".....passed
